1704196800.body:
Keep your children active through the winter at Calphin Swim Academy! Our mastery-based programs include learn-to-swim and stroke refinement classes that will help transform them into a strong swimmer, whether they are beginner or advanced. 

Classes are held everyday of the week in our indoor heated pools. Our next session will take place 1/2 - 3/17/24. Contact us to set up a trial today! 

(510)790-7946 - enroll@calphin.com - www.calphin.com

1704196800.title: Orange Ball Intermediate Tennis Clinic Registration Is Happening Now!
1704196800.body:
Orange Ball Intermediate tennis clinic registration is happening now, and there’s never been a better time to sign your grade school tennis player up for this unique experience in Fremont. Designed for kids between the ages of 8 and 12 with some prior tennis experience, every session will help your child develop the strategies necessary to win and the stamina required to make it through a match.

A fun, engaging experience, these grade school tennis clinics will leave your child looking forward to their next on-court experience. Euro members save more with every single clinic!

Register your child for clinics today.

Classes will take place on the following dates:

1.) Tuesdays 1/2 - 1/23 (5:00pm – 6:30pm)

2.) Sunday 1/7 - 1/28 (3:00pm – 4:30pm)

Visit our website today and sign up for one of our clinics!

https://euroschooloftennis.com...

If you have any questions, feel free to reach us at:

info@euroschooloftennis.com

(510)491-3007

1704196800.title: Hoping to help your teen tennis star take a big leap forward on the court?
1704196800.shortTitle: Hoping to help your teen tennis star take a big...
1704196800.body:
Hoping to help your teen tennis star take a big leap forward on the court? Our Teen Tennis Stars Intermediate clinics in Fremont are the perfect way to do just that. Developed for kids ages 9 – 14 with prior tennis experience, this is a great way to move beyond fundamentals and into the strategies and skills, they’ll need to become more successful on the court as they get older.

Our teen tennis lessons focus on new skills that will help improve their ability to serve, return, and move across the court. Challenge your child with this unique experience. Reach out and register today. Remember, Euro members save more with every single clinic!

Classes will take place on the following dates:

1.) Mondays 1/8 - 1/22 (3 days session due to New Year's Day) (6:30 pm-8:00 pm)

2.) Tuesdays 1/2 - 1/21 (6:30 pm-8:00 pm)

3.) Thursdays 1/4 - 1/25 (6:30 pm-8:00 pm)

4.) Saturdays 1/6 - 1/27 (1:30 pm-3:00 pm)

5.) Sundays 1/7 - 1/28 (6:00 pm-7:30 pm)

Visit our website today and sign up for one of our clinics!

info@euroschooloftennis.com

1704283200.title: Let Your Little One Explore Tennis!
1704283200.shortTitle: Let Your Little One Explore Tennis!
1704283200.body:
Don’t sideline your little one because they’re too young to enjoy the tennis courts. Sign up for our Pee Wee Tennis Clinics instead!

During every session, we let four- and five-year-old learn more about the game, have a little fun, and get the great start they need to continue a journey into a lifelong sport. Our preschooler program offers your youngest tennis star a fun introduction to the game in a setting that’s just perfect for their learning abilities. Every instructor continually provides the help kindergarten students need to understand the fundamentals of the game while keeping them motivated and interested. It’s the best introduction to the game ever! Sign up today.

Classes will take place on the following dates:

Wednesday, 4:05pm – 4:50pm 1/4 – 3/1

Visit our website today and sign up for one of our clinics!

https://euroschooloftennis.com...

For enrollment issues or inquiries call please contact Castro Valley Rec Dept:(510)881-6700. All other questions, comments or concerns can be directed to us: info@euroschooloftennis.com OR (510)491-3007

http://www.EuroSchoolofTennis.com

1704283200.title: No Tennis Experience? No Worries. Beginner Kids Tennis Lessons are Here!
1704283200.shortTitle: No Tennis Experience? No Worries. Beginner Kids...
1704283200.body:
The perfect time to help your child learn more about tennis is right now with our beginning kids tennis lessons. Dubbed our Mini Aces program, they’re designed for kids 6 – 8. This intergrade tennis lessons program is the ideal option for first through third grade kids who haven’t had any real exposure to the game. Every clinic is a great way to keep your child active while helping them understand the basics. From learning more about game play to serve and return skills, we’ll help your child learn what to do in a match while having a great time.

Registration for our Mini Aces clinics is open now. Teach your child just how much fun tennis can be.

Classes will take place on the following dates:

Wednesday, 5:00pm – 5:50pm 1/4 – 3/1

Visit our website today and sign up for one of our clinics!

1704283200.shortTitle: Tennis Is for Every Kid with Teen Tennis Stars...
1704283200.body:
Now is the perfect time to keep your child active, and tennis is a great way to do just that. Even if your child has never been on the court before, we can help them develop a lifelong love for the sport with our Teen Tennis Stars Novice clinics. Developed specifically for kids ages 9 – 14 with little or no tennis experience, we’ll teach your child just how much fun this game can be. By the time we’re done, they’ll be hitting with consistency so you can play a quick game with them any day of the week!

Help your preteen and teen love the sport as much as you do with these unique clinics. Hurry, spaces are filling up quickly for a tennis experience your child will never forget.

Classes will take place on the following dates:

Wednesday, 6:00pm – 6:50pm 1/3 – 3/6

Visit our website today and sign up for one of our clinics!

1704283200.title: Junior Performance Tennis Classes in Fremont (Advanced Ages 8 and up)
1704283200.shortTitle: Junior Performance Tennis Classes in Fremont...
1704283200.body:
This program is for juniors aged 8 and up and is the advanced tennis training program at Euro School of Tennis. Runs all throughout the year, what’s focused here is the improvement of students’ consistency, balance, speed, and stamina. Students also improve their technical skills and techniques to enhance their speed, power, and accuracy of tennis strokes.

Junior Performance has a fixed schedule on Wednesdays and Fridays at 6 pm - 8 pm, Saturday at 4 pm - 6 pm and Sunday 1pm-3 pm. Students have the option of having either 1 practice per week or 2 practices per week. This program is only held in Fremont location currently.

Duration: 2 hours per meeting; 4 meetings or 8 meetings a month

Wed/Fri 1/3 - 1/26 (6 pm - 8 pm)

Wed/Sun 1/3 - 1/28 (6 pm - 8 pm)

Fri/Sun 1/5 - 1/28 (6 pm - 8 pm)

Sat 1/6 - 1/27 (4 pm - 6 pm)

Class Size: 7 students max; 1 instructor

For more information on this program:

https://euroschooloftennis.com...

If you have any questions, feel free to reach us at:

info@euroschooloftennis.com

(510)491-3007

www.EuroSchoolofTennis.com

1704283200.title: Never Held a Racquet? No Problem. Get The Basics Now!
1704283200.shortTitle: Never Held a Racquet? No Problem. Get The...
1704283200.body:
Tennis truly is the sport of a lifetime, but even if you’ve never had a chance to learn, we’ll help you get there with our Adult Tennis Novice clinics. Designed for beginning tennis players ages 15 and up, you’ll learn to enjoy the game of tennis. We’ll help you understand more about the rules and the fundamentals necessary to enjoy match play.

Even if you’ve never held a racquet before, this is one experience you won’t want to miss. By the time we’re done, you’ll be serving and returning with consistency. Beginner tennis lessons are filling up fast, so register today for some serious fun!

Classes will take place on the following dates:

Wednesday, 7:00pm – 7:50pm 1/3 – 3/6

Visit our website today and sign up for one of our clinics!

https://euroschooloftennis.com...

For enrollment issues or inquiries call please contact Castro Valley Rec Dept:(510)881-6700. All other questions, comments or concerns can be directed to us: info@euroschooloftennis.com OR (510)491-3007

1704542400.title: Fremont Movie Screening and Q&A
1704542400.body:
Join us at the Fremont Main Library for a special screening of the critically acclaimed movie, Fremont:

“Donya, a former Afghan translator for the U.S. government, lives alone in Fremont, California. When she’s promoted to writing the fortunes at her job at a fortune cookie factory in the city, Donya’s loneliness and longing drive her to send a message out in a cookie, unsure where it may lead. Tenderly sculpted and lyrically shot in black-and-white, Babak Jalali’s FREMONT is a wry, deadpan vision of the universal longing for home.” – IMDb

Fremont is winner of the Grand Jury Prize for Narrative Feature by Independent Film Festival Boston 2023, winner for Best Director by Karlovy Vary International Film Festival 2023, nominee for Next Innovator Award by Sundance 2023, and nominee for Audience Award by SXSW 2023.

This event will include a special audience participation Q&A with Fremont movie producer Sudnya Shroff!

More Info Here

1704542400.body:
Hoping to offer your child a bit more in the way of tennis instruction? Our Fremont beginning tennis clinics called our Mini Aces Intermediate program, are the perfect solution. Ideal for kids ages 6 – 8 who have had some previous tennis instruction, every session will help your child learn more about how to craft the perfect serve, hit returns with power, and find success on the court. Participants should be able to hit the ball consistently before signing up for this course.

Help your child discover a fun tennis experience your beginning tennis player will love. Registration is starting now, and Euro members save more with every clinic. Register your child and see just how powerful they can be on the court this year.

1704715200.title: Let Your Little One Explore Tennis!
1704715200.shortTitle: Let Your Little One Explore Tennis!
1704715200.body:
Searching for the perfect way to introduce your child to the game of tennis?

This class offers a fun way to interact with your child, while teaching them the basics of the game! Kids learn in several different ways, and when they’re under the age of four, they primarily learn through play. Working with them in an active setting is an important part of both their physical and mental development. During the class, parents and children participate together in a fun, age-appropriate activities that will help your little ones develop the motor and socialization skills necessary to continue with tennis as they grow. Wear tennis shoes and bring a racquet size 19.

Monday, 5:40 pm – 6:30 pm 1/8 – 3/25 (No class: 1/15 & 2/19)

Wednesday, 5:10 pm – 6:00 pm, 1/10 – 3/27 (No class: 2/21)

Please visit our page for more info:

https://euroschooloftennis.com...

For enrollment issues or inquiries call San Carlos Rec Dept: (650-802-4122)

All other questions, comments or concerns can be directed to us: info@euroschooloftennis.com OR (510)491-3007

http://www.EuroSchoolofTennis.com

Surplus Assets to the Ongoing Operations of EcoSense Lighting
Online Auction January 9th - 11th

Featuring Research and Development Instruments from a Commercial and Residential Lighting Manufacturer

View Sale Details Here: https://svdisposition.com/auct...

Full Catalog Coming Soon

Featured Assets Include:

  • Nordson Asymtek Spectrum S-820B Precision Batch Dispensing System
  • AD 211 Plus Automatic Die Bonder
  • Royce Wire Bond Pull Tester
  • Ledgon 100 Goniophotometer
  • FlackTek Inc Speed Mixer
  • Micro Vu Optical Comparator
  • Kurabo Planetary Mixer
  • Agilent High Power Pulse Generator Model: 814A
  • BNC Universal Pulse Generator
  • Chroma Digital Power Meter Model 66202
  • TestEquity Temperature Chamber
  • APT VariPLUS Model 105 Power Converter and Variable Transformer
  • HP EMC Analyzer
  • Tektronix TDS210 Digital Real-Time Oscilloscope
  • Agilent Data Acquisition/Switch Unit
  • Sorensen Dual DC Power Supply
  • Vertical Thermal Shocl Chamber
  • Thermotron Chamber
  • AM Scope Microscope
  • Sikama Falcon 5C Reflow Furnace
  • Agilent DS0101024A Oscilloscope
  • CAS 120 Array Spectrometer
  • ThorLabs Dual channel Optical Power and Energy Meter
  • Newport RS 2000 Optical Table
  • Metro Toledo Scale
